message.content:
Based on the provided profiles and mortgage requirements, here's the ranking from most to least suitable:

#1 (Best Candidate): 55-year-old Senior Software Engineer
- Highest bank account balance (70,000 CHF)
- Stable employment at Google
- Mature age with likely stable career
- Domestic/partnered household suggests more financial stability

#2: 45-year-old Architect & Project Manager
- Mid-career professional
- Stable employment at renowned architecture firm
- Solid own funds distribution
- Domestic/partnered household

#3: 33-year-old Head of Communications & Marketing
- Younger professional
- Stable employment at Swiss Red Cross
- Solid professional profile
- Single status might indicate slightly less financial stability

#4 (Least Suitable): 39-year-old Auditor
- Lowest bank account balance (48,000 CHF)
- Lowest Pillar 3a balance
- Single status
- Still a solid professional profile, but comparatively weakest in this group

Key Considerations:
- All candidates have identical net income
- All have 218,000 CHF in own funds
- Age and household stability were primary differentiation factors
